At Neonicons, we believe in empowering designers and developers with beautifully crafted, versatile icon sets.
Our flagship product, the Neon Icons collection, offers a massive library of pixel-perfect, scalable vector icons designed to enhance any digital interface, perfectly aligning with our goal to provide top-tier design resources.
That all ties into our mission to simplify the icon selection process and elevate the aesthetic of digital products worldwide.

XvJpat.name: FFA | Cart Abandoned Flow #4
XvJpat.subject: Is everything alright?
XvJpat.html:
Hi there,
 
I noticed your discount code recently expired, and I just wanted to check in. Were there any issues checking out? If so, let me know—I’d be happy to help!
 
If the timing wasn’t right, no worries at all. We’d love for you to stay connected and continue taking part in our social initiatives.
 
Best,
Stephanie W.
Customer Success Assistant
